PARAMETERS.TITLE: Parameter usage guide
PARAMETERS.PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION: Optimize email writing time by using parameters to automatically replace appropriate content.
PARAMETERS.SUBJECT: Subject
PARAMETERS.STUDENT_CODE_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the student ID of the student receiving the email
PARAMETERS.STUDENT_NAME_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the name of the student receiving the email
PARAMETERS.CLASS_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the class name of the student receiving the email
PARAMETERS.MAJOR_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the major name of the student receiving the email
PARAMETERS.EMAIL_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the email of the student receiving the email
PARAMETERS.GENDER_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the gender of the student receiving the email
PARAMETERS.CURRENT_TERM_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the current term of the student receiving the email
PARAMETERS.SPECIALIZATION_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the specialization of the student receiving the email
PARAMETERS.MOBILE_PHONE_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the mobile phone number of the student receiving the email
PARAMETERS.PARENT_PHONE_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the parent phone number of the student receiving the email
PARAMETERS.CLASS_NAME_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the course class name of the student receiving the email
PARAMETERS.SEMESTER_NAME_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the semester name of the student receiving the email
PARAMETERS.SUBJECT_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the subject name of the student receiving the email
PARAMETERS.AVERAGE_MARK_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the student's average mark for the subject
PARAMETERS.FAIL_REASON_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the reason why the student failed the subject
PARAMETERS.TOTAL_ABSENCES_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the total absences of the student receiving the email
PARAMETERS.TOTAL_SLOTS_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the total sessions of the student receiving the email
PARAMETERS.ABSENCE_RATE_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the absence rate of the student receiving the email
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the description of the student receiving the email
PARAMETERS.DEFER_SEMESTER_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the deferred semester of the student receiving the email
PARAMETERS.DEFERMENT_DATE_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the deferment registration date of the student
PARAMETERS.START_DATE_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the deferment start date of the student receiving the email
PARAMETERS.END_DATE_DESCRIPTION: The system will automatically replace it with the deferment end date of the student receiving the email
